name: Project: Dream
description:
Project Dream is a game where you as the player travel into a world of dream full with a lot of obstacles to tackle.

Controls

- Use Left and Right arrow key to move

- Use Up arrow to jump

- Esc to pause the game

Notice!

This game is created for my school's event called "Personal Project Exhibition". Any updates or changes will be added later. Although this game is a "Finished prototype",  there is some bugs in-game 

Created by: Akhtar Hafiz P. 

Game Engine: Godot
